name: Careersutra
overview:
Careersutra.in is a new entity started to train state of art technology training and placements to the technical students who like to take starting steps in their career.

We are a team of professionals working in different industries, joined hands together to support students build a strong career path. We provide the following support to students and help them excel in their careers.

Providing a proper platform for students to come and execute their innovative technical projects. Sky is the limit and we support them by providing all the facilities required for their projects. Projects can range from bachelor degree to post doctoral level. With vast experience in different industries, we guide students for their projects from concept to completion.

We also equip students with the cutting edge technical and professional skills through seminars, workshops and innovative courses, enabling them to achieve a successful and rewarding career. We can tie up with educational institutions for providing them courses to their faculty and students.

Our parent firm, EVHUB was started as an information portal in 2008 to share the articles on electric vehicles and promote the concept of these green technologies via internet. Till 2010, EVHUB was concentrating only on promoting EVs via articles, news. In 2010, EVHUB got opportunity to be the online media partner to Bangalore International Auto Expo 2011. EVHUB has put up the stall in the Auto expo as the event’s Media partner. This opportunity has given exposure to the real time audience.
